title: Unable to Reconnect to game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So I have a problem with my LoL Client, Every time after the champ select right when the game is about to start loading I get the reconnect screen,  I hit reconnect nothing happens and when the game is finished its still stuck on this screen until I restart the Client. Does anyone know what I can do to fix this? I got the 5 game penalty because of this :( so please help!    -Zach

replies.body:
I have gotten the same problem went through all the connection issues
and it doesn't change at all

When champion select ends you are leaving the client and entering the game, so this issue seems to be unrelated to the client.  The problem seems to specifically be with failing to reach the game servers, and resulting in that error.  You should go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
